title: AI-Based Web Application for Customer Feedback Analytics
description: Developed and deployed an AI-based web application for customer feedback analytics, featuring an Emotion Detection system built with Watson AI libraries. This project processed text feedback to identify specific emotions, providing valuable insights for e-commerce. Responsible for full-stack development, including Flask deployment, unit testing, and error handling.

title: HubSpot API Integration with Node.js
description: Developed a Node.js web application to integrate with the HubSpot CRM API. This project involved creating and managing custom objects in HubSpot, implementing GET/POST routes with Express.js and Axios, and using Pug templating for the UI. Gained hands-on experience in API integration, full-stack development, and Git workflow.

title: Sales and Marketing Campaign to promote Sydney Olympic Park to Business
description: Through this three-month project working with Sydney Olympic Park Business Association, the key aims to come up with a sales and marketing plan to acquire more businesses to locate, relocate or expand to Sydney Olympic Park.

title: Applied Data Science Capstone Project - Sydney City Nightlife Choice
description: The final assignment of the IBM Data Science course is the so-called "Capstone Project" in which many of the tools and methods learned throughout the recent months are applied in a self-chosen challenge around the general idea of a "Battle of Neighbourhoods", e. g. the analysis and useful preparation of data on venues in city environments. I chose the city of Sydney as a case. To pass the final assignment, creating a Jupyter Notebook with Python as the programming language and all the necessary code and comments is required, as are a blogpost or presentation and a final report.

title: Property Technology and Its Impact on Real Estate Sales & Marketing Strategies
description: To what extent is Property Technology disrupting UAEâ€™s real estate industry. Gone through data analysis: correlation of trust in online pictures with certain property technologies.
